channel.title: Comments on: Imali Yethu: Our Money
channel.description: Civil Society Coalition Working to Open Budgets

item.title: By: Zukiswa Kota
item.dc:creator: Zukiswa Kota
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2017/11/09/hello-world/#comment-5">Norman MAPELA</a>.
This is a great suggestion - thank you - we will forward it to the rest of vulekamali team for discussion. Oversight institutions are an integral component to be sure!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Norman MAPELA.

This is a great suggestion – thank you – we will forward it to the rest of vulekamali team for discussion. Oversight institutions are an integral component to be sure!

item.title: By: Zukiswa Kota
item.dc:creator: Zukiswa Kota
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2017/11/09/hello-world/#comment-6">Nolubabalo Magocoba</a>.
Hi Nolubabalo! Thank you so much for the encouragement and positive feedback. We would love for to join us. Please send an email to our coordinator Zukiswa on z.kota@ru.ac.za and let's set up further discussions. We're also very serious about engaging people from all corners of the country of varying backgrounds!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Nolubabalo Magocoba.

Hi Nolubabalo! Thank you so much for the encouragement and positive feedback. We would love for to join us. Please send an email to our coordinator Zukiswa on z.kota@ru.ac.za and let’s set up further discussions. We’re also very serious about engaging people from all corners of the country of varying backgrounds!

item.title: By: Nolubabalo Magocoba
item.dc:creator: Nolubabalo Magocoba
item.description: This is powerful, I heard about it from TV news on Budget Speech. I was so taken up by the fact that there are people that came together for our country, this will bring change in our country with the help from God. I wish to join the movement if may call it like that, but I am grown up woman. I am interested in empowerment especially empowering ordinary citizens. I am in a new organization called Rise Up With Advocacy and Action looking at Rights and Governance. I like the concept of Vuleka Mali.
item.content:encoded:
This is powerful, I heard about it from TV news on Budget Speech. I was so taken up by the fact that there are people that came together for our country, this will bring change in our country with the help from God.
I wish to join the movement if may call it like that, but I am grown up woman. I am interested in empowerment especially empowering ordinary citizens. I am in a new organization called Rise Up With Advocacy and Action looking at Rights and Governance. I like the concept of Vuleka Mali.

item.title: By: Norman MAPELA
item.dc:creator: Norman MAPELA
item.description: Max Sisulu developed National Speakers "Oversight Model" including "Oversight" by Civil Society, ISIZIBA Constituency had such Model and ready to implement it at Municipality, Provincial and National Speaker's Civil Society Coordination Office, we encourage that such Model be implemented to leverage Budget Accountability
item.content:encoded: Max Sisulu developed National Speakers “Oversight Model” including “Oversight” by Civil Society, ISIZIBA Constituency had such Model and ready to implement it at Municipality, Provincial and National Speaker’s Civil Society Coordination Office, we encourage that such Model be implemented to leverage Budget Accountability
